item.title: Emvoice Releases Their First Full Voice
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Emvoice has released their first full voice “Lucy” and is now available for purchase. The full voice gives you the vocal engine across the entire range(E2 to A4) and can be purchased for $200 USD. You can also try the basic mode that is free and gives you seven notes. What is Emvoice Emvoice One …

The post Emvoice Releases Their First Full Voice appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Emvoice has released their first full voice “Lucy” and is now available for purchase. The full voice gives you the vocal engine across the entire range(E2 to A4) and can be purchased for $200 USD. You can also try the basic mode that is free and gives you seven notes.

What is Emvoice

Emvoice One is a plugin in VST2, VST3 and AU formats on Mac and PC. You’ll need a compatible DAW (such as Logic, Reaper, Ableton Live, Studio One and more) to run it within.

If you want more details on how Emvoice works, you can check out their video below.

For full information on Lucy and Emvoice, you can check out their website here.

The post Emvoice Releases Their First Full Voice appeared first on VNN.
